actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill authorizing the construction of a dam and reservoir on the Little White River, SD, (Rosebud site).

summary.text: Authorizes the construction of a dam and reservoir on the Little White River, South Dakota (Rosebud site). Authorizes appropriations of such sums as are necessary to carry out the purposes of this Act.

titles.title: A bill authorizing the construction of a dam and reservoir on the Little White River, SD, (Rosebud site).
